story_28_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
We’ve taken down a good chunk of them, but it
may still be a while before the situation is totally
under control.
story_28_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
What are you two doing here? I told you not
to come!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I know we’re the ones to blame for getting hurt
and delaying your arrival, but...
story_28_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Can we use this opportunity to make things up to
you? Let us fight by your side!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Foolishness! In your injured state, you’ll only slow
me down!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: Now stand back and follow your orders!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Listen—this incursion is nothing more than a petty
tantrum. The semifinals are the real battle!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
When we reach that stage, you two will give me
your absolute best! I need all of your strength.
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You got it, sir! We’ll make sure we’re a thousand
percent healed up and ready for the match, ’K?
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
These scoundrels just keep coming, don’t they...
No sympathy for the elderly whatsoever.
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I know! And they chose to barge in right before
our big match! Tch... I guess now isn’t the best
time to worry about that, though.
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: Come on, Pryce! Let’s take care of these jerks!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
What do you two think you’re doing?! You can’t
expect to protect anyone fighting like that!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Hush! Just leave the rest of this fiasco to me!
I’ll find a way to get us all out of this!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2200_10:
For now, I’m leaving you to defend this area,
understood?! Don’t you dare mess this up!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Ugh! What was that all about?! He’s still just as
mean to us as ever!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: Heh. He’s leaving it to us...
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2500_10: The lad’s growing fast, just as I thought he would.
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Ah, just an old man’s rambling. Come, child!
Let’s give this battle all we’ve got!
story_28_04000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I’ll show these thugs why they call me the
Winter Trainer!
